description:
Jack Griffin is one of the models that has a large body of work out there. I do deliberately try to get these guys in to my studios.
Not sure why some studios are so eager to only work with guys who have done zero work, but I am going with the concept that most members only belong to 1 or 2 sites, that they might be pleased to see these models in action at ChaosMen.
Jack is doing a limited appearance. For now, just a couple vids. If you have read these summaries before, you know I like to work with the pro models on occasion, but take them through the standard solo and oral video first. Just to see how they do before investing in a more expensive sex film.
Clearly Jack knows what he is doing in the solo, and next week his oral is amazing.
Enjoy!
title: Jack Griffin - Solo
